Sciences will formally recognize Alex Piquero as the 2011 Academy Scholar at its next annual meeting, scheduled for Marc Gertzh 1-5 in Toronto.`` I am deeply honored and humbled by this recognition,'' Alex Piquero said. I owe it in large part to the unmatched intellectual environment, collegiality and support that enables my Florida State criminology colleagues, students and I to thrive as we do. As a professor, I couldn't ask for anything more rewarding than teaching students, sharing my excitement for criminological issues with them, seeing them continue their education and become academics and policymakers, and then knowing that they in turn are mentoring their students and collaborating with colleagues. So far, Alex Piquero has more than 20 articles slated for journal publication in 2011. Your Own Boss in 12 Months.`` You have to figure out whether your ego can take Sergey Bringing another person to the table who's really making decisions that affect your business,'' Eric Schmidt says. Not only do you have to have clearly defined roles for you and your new manager, but you have to make sure those roles are clear to everyone at your company.
